channel.title: Showplayersbank command not ::BANK. need help
channel.description: anyone know a command that an admin can use to view another players bank without looking into the source files? im using a pi source.

item.title: Showplayersbank command not ::BANK. need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Have you even heard of google…
Took me 30 seconds, credit to whoever wrote this:

f (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { try { String player = playerCommand.substring(10); int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if(Server.playerHandler.players[id] != null) { Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id]; int bankItems[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE]; int bankItemsN[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE]; for(int i = 0; i < Config.BANK_SIZE; i++) { bankItems[i] = c.bankItems[i]; bankItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i]; c.bankItems[i] = other.bankItems[i]; c.bankItemsN[i] = other.bankItemsN[i]; } c.getPA().openUpBank(); c.viewingOtherBank = true; for(int j = 0; j < Config.BANK_SIZE; j++) { c.bankItems[j] = bankItems[j]; c.bankItemsN[j] = bankItemsN[j]; } c.sendMessage("Viewing bank of "+other.properName+"."); } } catch(Exception e) { } }

[code]
/**

  • Open bank
    **/
    public void openUpBank(){
    if(c.inTrade || c.tradeStatus == 1) {
    Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.tradeWith];
    if(o != null) {
    o.getTradeAndDuel().declineTrade();
    }
    }
    if(c.duelStatus == 1) {
    Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.duelingWith];
    if(o != null) {
    o.getTradeAndDuel().resetDuel();
    }
    }
    if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
    c.getItems().resetItems(5064);
    c.getItems().rearrangeBank();
    c.getItems().resetBank();
    c.getItems().resetTempItems();
    c.getOutStream().createFrame(248);
    c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292);
    c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063);
    c.flushOutStream();
    c.banking = true;
    }

}[/code]

Read full topic
